item.title: Encargo 02
item.description: Valor Endógeno Ver Pantalla Completa function myFunction(id) { document.getElementById(id).classList.add("full-screen"); } document.addEventListener('keydown', function(event){ if(event.key === "Escape"){ document.getElementById('pdf-hugo').classList.remove("full-screen"); } });
